name: Olympia (Zoey Reyes)
description:
2D Top-Down Shooter in which you fight waves of enemies and defeat bosses in order to achieve your ends.

Godspeed.

Created for the Bored Pixels Game Jam 3. 

Controls

 WASD - Movement

Space - Shoot

R - Switch Weapons

Credits:

Calvin Oh - Programming

Evan Karlson - Design

Jared Sutton - Music

Pedro A. Tresgallo - Programming

Robert Sandoval - Design

Zoey Reyes - Design
